data.prayer: Spirit, help the 14,012 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,259,788 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anugul, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Anugul unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Anugul, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Anugul, Odisha, India.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Anugul.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Dolokondiyari people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, give the disciples of the the county of Anugul an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,244,333, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Anugul, Odisha, India has a population of 1,273,800.

We estimate Anugul has 14,012 people who might know Jesus, 15,455 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,244,333 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Anugul, Odisha, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
